title: Tasks Get Request
description: Request parameters for retrieving a specific task by ID with optional conversation history across all AdCP domains

task_id.description: Unique identifier of the task to retrieve

include_history.description: Include full conversation history for this task (may increase response size)

context.description: Initiator-provided context included in the request payload. Agents must echo this value back unchanged in responses and webhooks. Use for UI/session hints, correlation tokens, or tracking metadata.

examples.description: Get task with full conversation history
